hadith.chapterTitle: The Obligation of Hajj (Pilgrimage) and its Excellence
hadith.body:
'Aishah (May Allah be pleased with her) reported: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "There is no day on which Allah sets free more slaves from Hell than He does on the Day of 'Arafah."

[Muslim].
- وعنها أن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم، قال‏:‏ ‏"‏ما من يوم أكثر من أن يعتق الله فيه عبدًا من النار من يوم عرفة‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏رواه مسلم‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
